title: Transports: Stdio & HTTP/SSE
description:
Implement transport layers for MCP communication.

## Scope
- Stdio transport for CLI usage
- HTTP transport for web/worker deployment
- SSE streaming for real-time updates
- Session management for HTTP

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Stdio transport connects to MCP SDK
- [ ] HTTP transport handles JSON-RPC requests
- [ ] SSE streaming works for long-running operations
- [ ] Sessions are managed with TTL
